root.name: Betty Boop's Double Shift
root.description: OverviewBetty Boop's Double Shift leads players through Betty's quest to make a name for herself in the movies by helping her earn enough money to move to the big city where she can realize her dream. By helping Grampy open his own club, Betty takes on two roles: First, she is the club's waitress, and must take customers' orders. Second, she provides patrons with entertainment on stage, with both of these jobs utilizing the Nintendo DS's touch screen capabilities. Both single and multi-player modes are provided.

similar_games.game: Diner Dash: Flo on the Go
